content: later and continue with color a on 48 sts as follows rnds 8-12 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea st around join with slip_stitch 48 half_double_crochet skip to round 14 for ribbed cuff for teen/adult size cut color b leaving 6 tail for weaving in later and continue with color a as follows round 8 increase round chain 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet *2 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 60 half_double_crochet round 9 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around 60 half_double_crochet round 10 increase round chain 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in ea of next 4 half_double_crochet *2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in ea of next 4 half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 72 half_double_crochet rnds 11-13 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around 72 half_double_crochet begin ribbed cuff 2 note for child size work only 4 rounds of ribbing as follows working 2 rounds in color a and 2 rounds in color b round 14 chain 2 work front post half_double_crochet fphdc around post of next half_double_crochet *work back post half_double_crochet bphdc around post of next half_double_crochet work front post half_double_crochet fphdc around post of next half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 72 half_double_crochet round 15 chain 2 work fphdc around fphdc *work bphdc around bphdc work fphdc around fphdc repeat from * around 72 half_double_crochet rnds 16-17 repeat round 15 changing to color b at end of round 17 cut color a and continue with color b rnds 18-20 chain 2 work fphdc around fphdc work bphdc around bphdc repeat from * around at end of round 20 join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in all ends copyright 2017 2007 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
